entries.attacking_rebel: Hey...I recognize you from the Imperial agents HoloNet report. You're under arrest! Halt!
entries.rebel_cowards_rebel: Everything seems to be in order. Have a good evening.
entries.rebel_cowards_imperial: Well, everything checks out. If there are any Rebels in here they're stinking cowards who won't stand up for their own pitiful cause.
entries.harass_15_rebel: No offense but...that outfit is pretty silly.
entries.harass_14_rebel: You need to clean up your act. You look like you just crawled out of the Sarlacc pit.
entries.harass_13_rebel: I think I'll come back here when I'm off duty.
entries.harass_12_rebel: I heard a rumor that Vader kills his own commanding officers. What kind of military wastes soldiers like that?
entries.harass_11_rebel: I'm thinking I should bring you in for identification.
entries.harass_10_rebel: If you're an Imperial, they must be scraping the bottom of the barrel.
entries.harass_9_rebel: I hope this war ends soon. It's bloody depressing.
entries.harass_8_rebel: Rebel control of this area is fairly tenative. Our patrols are all on edge due to reports of stormtroopers in the area.
entries.harass_7_rebel: If the worst thing that happens tonight is I run into some bum without records, I'll consider myself lucky.
entries.harass_6_rebel: Buddy of mine's a pilot. Lost his legs fighting against the Death Star. You could say I don't like Imperials much.
entries.harass_5_rebel: What is that you're drinking anyway? Smells a bit too much for my taste.
entries.harass_4_rebel: Look, HQ doesn't have any record of you. If you've got something you want to tell me, you better do it now.
entries.harass_3_rebel: I hate inspection duty. Never know when you'll run into an Imperial agent in disguise.
entries.harass_2_rebel: I wish I could stay for a drink, but I'm on duty.
entries.harass_1_rebel: This music isn't bad, but I kinda like the stuff from my homeworld better.
entries.sudden_moves_rebel: You better hold still while I call this in. Don't make any sudden moves.
entries.sudden_moves_imperial: You're a drunk and you can't even manage to explain why the sixth stamp is missing from your papers? Don't make any sudden moves. I'm going to call this in.
entries.checking_out_rebel: Whoa, pal. You aren't in the Republic HoloNet. How do you explain that?
entries.checking_out_imperial: These papers look like forgeries. Your breath stinks. You're drunk aren't you?
entries.looking_at_rebel: Hold still while I check the HoloNet for your ID.
entries.looking_at_imperial: Who are you looking at, huh? Let me see your papers!
entries.harass_guy_rebel: Hmm. I don't recognize you. You look like an Imperial.
entries.harass_guy_imperial: You there! I don't think I've seen you before.
entries.only_one_here_rebel: Huh. You're the only one here? Well, drink responsibly. I don't want to have to toss you in the brig later.
entries.only_one_here_imperial: There's only you? That seems suspicious.
entries.rebel_scum_rebel: Good evening, folks. Hope everyone is having a good time.
entries.rebel_scum_imperial: This is an Imperial inspection. Cooperate and you will not be harmed.
entries.call_in_rebel: Don't mind me. Just seeing how things are going.
entries.call_in_imperial: This is patrol. I'm going to check the cantina.
entries.attacking_imperial: I don't like the way you look or the way you smell. You've been acting strange since I walked in. You must be a Rebel. You're under arrest.
entries.harass_15_imperial: I have more respect for a rockmite than for a Rebel.  At least the rockmite doesn't know any better.  Maybe you Rebels don't either.
entries.harass_14_imperial: We've had reports of Jedi in the area. If you see a Jedi report him to the local Imperial authority. You may be detained for questioning, but it will be brief.
entries.harass_13_imperial: If you're a Rebel, then now's the time to say it.  I'll treat you as fairly as I treat any criminal...
entries.harass_12_imperial: Rebels seem to think they're above the law. They're just a disgrace to the entire galaxy.
entries.harass_11_imperial: I can't believe some of the noble families have aligned themselves with the Rebels.  Just goes to show you how spoiled they really are.
entries.harass_10_imperial: We got reports that some of the Rebels are in hiding.  Exactly what I would expect from a group of cowards.
entries.harass_9_imperial: I hear Princess Leia is in league with the Rebels. Doesn't surprise me, I never did trust her.
entries.harass_8_imperial: The Rebellion is doomed to failure.
entries.harass_7_imperial: The way people in these cantinas dress disgusts me.
entries.harass_6_imperial: The only thing about Rebels that I like is...nevermind, I don't like anything about Rebels.
entries.rebel_cowards: Ok, everything checks out here.  Any Rebels in the area are just cowards, so they're no threat.
entries.harass_5_imperial: Rebels are only good for one thing: target practice.
entries.harass_4_imperial: My job would be much more pleasant if I didn't have to deal with stinking Rebels.
entries.harass_3_imperial: This music is subversive. With any luck the Emperor will pass a decree shutting places like this down.
entries.harass_2_imperial: You really do stink. I can smell your womp rat breath through the filter on my mask.
entries.harass_1_imperial: HQ doesn't have a record on you. Vagrancy isn't against the law here, but if you so much as make one wrong move I'll haul you in.
entries.only_one_here: There's only one suspect in the area...
